history.proof: unfold ball_norm. hauto lq: on use: cond_pos, @plus_opp_r, norm_zero unfold: norm, minus, AbelianGroup.sort, NormedModule.AbelianGroup, Rgt.

original: unfold ball_norm. unfold ball. unfold locally. unfold ball_norm in e. destruct e as [eps He]. exists eps. intros y. apply He. unfold ball. auto.
